citation: Evidence (Audio and Audio Visual Links) Regulations 2018 (Tas)
text:
Evidence (Audio and Audio Visual Links) Regulations 2018

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, make the following regulations under the Evidence (Audio and Audio Visual Links) Act 1999 .

21 May 2018

C. WARNER

Governor

By Her Excellency's Command,

ELISE ARCHER

Minister for Justice

1. Short title
    These regulations may be cited as the Evidence (Audio and Audio Visual Links) Regulations 2018 .

2. Commencement
    These regulations take effect on the day on which their making is notified in the Gazette.

3. Interpretation
    In these regulations â€“
        Act means the Evidence (Audio and Audio Visual Links) Act 1999 .

4. Certain tribunals prescribed as Tasmanian courts
    The following tribunals are prescribed as Tasmanian courts for the purposes of the definition of Tasmanian court in section 3 of the Act:
            (a) . . . . . . . .
            (b) . . . . . . . .
            (c) . . . . . . . .
            (d) . . . . . . . .
            (e) Legal Profession Disciplinary Tribunal;
            (f) . . . . . . . .
            (g) . . . . . . . .
            (h) Property Agents Tribunal;
            (i) Tasmanian Civil and Administrative Tribunal;
            (j) Tasmanian Industrial Commission;
            (k) Tasmanian Planning Commission;
            (l) . . . . . . . .
            (m) . . . . . . . .

5. Legislation rescinded
    The legislation specified in Schedule 1 is rescinded.

SCHEDULE 1 - Legislation rescinded

Regulation 5

Evidence (Audio and Audio Visual Links) Regulations 2008 (No. 72 of 2008)
                                                                         


Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.
